<S%H5002>"Behold,<s%> I am against you," says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "and I will <S%H1197>burn<s%> her <S%H7393>chariots<s%> in the <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H398>devour<s%> your young <S%H3715>lions;<s%> and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> your <S%H2964>prey<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H4397>messengers<s%> will no longer be <S%H8085>heard.<s%>"
